solution_line_template: In the three quarters we have figures for, the store made a total of ${profit_q1} + ${profit_q3} + ${profit_q4} = $<<{profit_q1}+{profit_q3}+{profit_q4}={profit_three_quarters}>>{profit_three_quarters}.

Subtracting this from their annual profit shows that they made ${annual_profit} - ${profit_three_quarters} = $<<{annual_profit}-{profit_three_quarters}={profit_q2}>>{profit_q2} profit in the second quarter.
